Question.Subject: How do I connect to the Internet.......?
Question.Content:
I have a NETGEAR router for my laptop, and I accidentally disconnected it. Now when I try to reconnect it says I need a password. I do not know the password. The Internet company didn't set it up, my dad did. Could I call the NETGEAR company and ask for the password or something? What can I do?
Thanks!
Question.ChosenAnswer: Yes, call netgear, they should be able to help you. I had the same problem and they sorted me out in no time. Good luck!

Answer.Content: Yes, call netgear, they should be able to help you. I had the same problem and they sorted me out in no time. Good luck!
